personalInfo.family: Wife, Erin; Walter Woodson III (nickname Trey) (6/15/13)
personalInfo.clubAffl: The Foundry GC (Powhattan, Virginia), Mill Quarter Plantation (Powhatan, Virginia)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Finished T74 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.carHigh: Played on the Swing Thought Tour from 2004-2015 and won eight times.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: While attending James Madison University, held the career low-stroke average...Was named JMU scholar of the year in 2004...Won the Virginia State Amateur in 2002 and 2003...Was all state in golf in 1999 and 1999...
tourBios.personal: At 4 years old, his dad gave him a cutoff wooden driver with black electrical tape as grip which he used to hit balls over the creek at his home course...Biggest thrills in golf are winning the Virginia state open three straight years 2012-2014 and winning the Big Break Invitational in 2014 at Reynolds Plantation...Entrance song on the first tee would be "Ramblin Man"by the Allman Brothers...His cousin, Mikey Moyers, plays on the Web.com Tour...In 2011, he spent half of his time teaching physical education at a high school...Not many people know that he can still dunk and was going to major in art at JMU...Favorite quote is "luck is where preparation meets opportunity"...Always marks his ball with the coin heads up and his lucky number is 13...Would love to switch places with the President of the United States and learn about what goes on behind the scenes...Went to 1996 Masters Tournament with his father and followed Tiger Woods, Jack Nicklaus and Arnold Palmer during Wednesday's practice round...Met Jerry Rice and Mark Rypien through his experience with the Big Break...Was an all state quarterback and defensive back in 1999 at Powhatan HS...Played football, golf, basketball and ran track in high school...His high school team won the Virginia State Championship in football in 1996 and was runner-up in 1997.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T41st in 2010 at the Melwood Prince George's County Open Presented by Under Armour.
